complaint.description: Absolutely nightmarish experience with Vodacom bills - I cannot reach ANYONE in the accounts department to explain why I have been billed such high amounts and I suspect FRAUD on my account, or I have been fraudulently subscribed to services I did not consent to. There is no explanation on my invoice. Call center and chatbot absolutely useless. Visited the Ferndale on Republic outlet and they couldn't do a thing. Disgusted as I have been a customer for over 10 years.
complaint.suggestion: Investigate the billing issue and provide a detailed explanation to the customer. Take necessary actions to resolve any fraudulent activities on the account. Improve the accessibility and effectiveness of the call center and chatbot. Ensure that the customer receives proper assistance and support at the outlet.
